sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: CCC Intelligent Solutions (NASDAQ: CCC) launches $500 million buyback, $300 million ASR
feed.summary: CCC Intelligent Solutions (NASDAQ: CCC) has announced a new $500 million share repurchase authorization and an immediate $300 million accelerated share repurchase (ASR) program with Bank of America. The ASR will be funded by incremental term loans under its amended credit agreement, with initial delivery of approximately 33.2 million shares representing about 80% of expected repurchases. The ASR is anticipated to conclude by the end of Q2 2026, leaving $200 million for future repurchases.

feed.title: CCC Announces $500 Million Share Repurchase Authorization and $300 Million Accelerated Share Repurchase Program

The company has also entered into an accelerated share repurchase program worth $300 million with Bank of America, N.A., which is expected to be completed by the end of the second quarter of 2026. This move reflects CCC's confidence in its long-term growth, robust free cash flow, and commitment to delivering returns to shareholders.

feed.title: CCC Intelligent Solutions Launches Pay Management Tool for Collision Repair Industry
feed.summary: CCC Intelligent Solutions Inc. has launched CCC® Pay Workflow, a new pay management tool designed to streamline payday discussions between collision repair technicians and payroll managers. This solution aims to reduce administrative burdens and employee frustration associated with pay-related issues, a common factor in technician turnover. The tool allows technicians to view upcoming paysheets and flag discrepancies via a mobile app, while managers can track and approve requests through a centralized dashboard.

feed.title: CCC Intelligent Solutions Adds REVV to Diagnostics Network
feed.summary: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC) has integrated REVV, an AI-powered calibration software, into its Diagnostics Network, allowing repair facilities to automatically transfer calibration documentation into CCC ONE® workfiles. This integration aims to streamline labor-intensive calibration processes, improve documentation accuracy, and support seamless communication between repairers and insurers. The collaboration helps shops manage the increasing complexity of vehicle ADAS technology and ensure complete repair records.
